backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing user profiles, tablature sequences, and fingering configurations with role-based access control (admin/user) and blob storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting the fix for the 'Actor not available' error in useBackendFingerings.ts and useBackendSequences.ts, replacing the raw error with a user-friendly 'Connecting to the network' message.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Truncated JSON file containing one-sentence summaries of all frontend source files, covering hooks, components, utilities, and configuration modules.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS entry point defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark themes including colors, borders, charts, and sidebar variables.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell for the Ocarina Music App that mounts the React app at the #root div and loads the Vite entry point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component setting up TanStack Router with two routes (MainPage at '/' and AdminFingeringConfig at '/admin'), a shared layout with Toaster, and a footer attribution link.
frontend/src/components/InstrumentSelect: Dropdown component using shadcn Select to choose an instrument from the INSTRUMENTS config, currently listing only the Ocarina.
frontend/src/components/Ocarina3DModel.t: React Three Fiber component rendering an animated turtle-shaped 3D ocarina with shell, head, flippers, tone holes, and fingertip meshes that animate based on the active fingering prop.
frontend/src/components/OcarinaScene.tsx: Canvas wrapper that sets up lighting, shadows, OrbitControls, and renders the Ocarina3DModel inside a React Three Fiber scene with a transparent background.
frontend/src/components/PianoKeyboard.ts: Renders an interactive piano keyboard component with white and black keys, mouse event handlers for note start/end, and an octave selector UI.
frontend/src/components/SequenceList.tsx: Displays a scrollable list of saved musical sequences with note count, duration, and a preview of the first 12 notes; clicking a sequence triggers playback.
frontend/src/components/SheetMusicView.t: Renders a basic SVG sheet music view of a recorded note sequence, mapping notes to staff positions with ledger lines, a treble clef, and whole/half/quarter note glyphs.
frontend/src/components/TablaturePanel.t: Shows fingering diagrams for each note in a recorded sequence using a turtle-shaped SVG hole diagram, with note name and duration labels.
frontend/src/config/instruments.ts: Defines the InstrumentConfig interface and a list of available instruments (currently only Ocarina), with a helper to look up an instrument by ID.
frontend/src/constants/fingeringMap.ts: Defines the Fingering and FingeringMap types, hole labels, and a default 12-note ocarina fingering map mapping note names to four-hole boolean arrays.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous Internet Computer actor using the current identity, invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
Provides React Query hooks for fetching all fingerings from the backend (falling back to defaults) and saving a fingering, with error message extraction utilities.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendSequences.t: Provides React Query hooks for fetching all saved sequences from the backend and saving a new sequence, with BigInt normalization and error message extraction.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication, wrapping DFINITY's AuthClient to expose login, logout, and identity state with status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useOcarinaAudio.ts: Custom hook that manages Web Audio API oscillators to play and stop ocarina-like tones using blended sine waves with attack/release envelopes.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Re-exports all backend query hooks for fingerings and sequences from their respective modules as a convenience barrel file.
frontend/src/hooks/useRecording.ts: Custom hook for recording note sequences with timing, tracking note start/end times to produce duration-stamped entries convertible to TablatureEntry format.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet importing Cinzel and Lora fonts, defining a warm parchment-themed CSS variable palette for light/dark modes, and adding utility component classes for parchment, wood, and stone texture panels.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app wrapped in QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
Admin page for viewing and editing ocarina fingering configurations per note, with authentication-gated save functionality backed by the backend fingering API.
frontend/src/pages/MainPage.tsx: Main application page combining the ocarina scene, piano keyboard, sheet music, tablature, and sequence list, with note playback, recording, and authenticated melody saving.
frontend/src/utils/audioUtils.ts: Utility functions for converting note names to frequencies using equal temperament tuning, extracting note components, and formatting durations as musical symbols.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, persisting, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage fallback support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with dark mode, custom fonts (Cinzel, Lora), OKLCH-based semantic color palettes (terracotta, amber, forest, parchment), and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state snapshot for a Caffeine AI ocarina music app, documenting existing features, architectural notes, known issues (actor initialization errors), and versioned feature/requirement mappings.
